text: @JohnCornyn @DailyCaller Quit hating on women and people of color.  Your state has a raging covid19 problem. POTUS and AG are trying to obstruct justice by firing head of SDNY. You have a lot of crises to address, Senator, and @AmbassadorRice isn’t one of them. Do your job! 😡
